# p5.nvim Assets Directory

This directory contains dynamically fetched p5.js assets that are cached for offline use.

## Files Generated by Workflows

- `p5.js` - Core p5.js library (fetched from CDN)
- `p5.sound.js` - Official p5.js sound addon (fetched from CDN)
- `p5.d.ts` - TypeScript definitions for core p5.js (from @types/p5)
- `constants.d.ts` - p5.js constants TypeScript definitions (from @types/p5)
- `literals.d.ts` - p5.js literals TypeScript definitions (from @types/p5)
- `.version` - Tracks current p5.js version for update checking

## Asset Management

- **Automatic Updates**: GitHub Actions checks daily for new releases
- **Smart Fallback**: Plugin uses these local files when available, falls back to CDN
- **Version Tracking**: `.version` file enables automatic update detection
- **Git Exclusions**: Static assets are in `.gitignore` to prevent committing

## Access in Code

Assets are accessed through `lua/p5/templates.lua`:
- `build_library_url()` checks for local files first
- `type_url()` checks for local type definitions first
- Falls back to CDN if local assets not available

## Manual Updates

Run `./scripts/update-assets.sh` to manually update all assets to latest versions.
